name: HomeWorker
0:
”Alexa open home worker”
”Give me a productivity life hack”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home worker
des:
Working from home can be tough. We help you find home office happiness by providing inspiration, knowledge and fun for your time at home. We know the road to success can be long and winding. That's why we want to make it fun with business focussed life hacks, inspiration and even a business quiz to keep you moving forward, entertained and enlightened.

Open and Launch
----------------------

"Alexa Open Home Worker"

Productivity
---------------

"Give me a productivity life hack"

Inspiration
--------------

"Give me some inspiration"

Influential Leader Quote
------------------------------

"Give me a quote"

Knowledge
--------------
Play a multiple choice game and test your business knowledge from thousands of business questions and get to test your knowledge and learn at the same time.

"Give me a business question"
"Play a game"

Shortcuts
----------

"I'm bored" -> Plays Business Knowledge Game
"Business Quote" -> Gives Business Quote
"Inspiration" -> Get Inspiration
"Productivity" -> Productivity Life Hack
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
